body:
Comment 4 by **seharris**: 
I did find a change against diff-mode.el that looks like it may handle this problem,
fresher than the stale copy I have in Aquamacs:

  http://repo.or.cz/w/emacs.git/commit/73d77049d97e72900b95c630e035d2b737a32967?f=lisp/vc/diff-mode.el
  http://repo.or.cz/w/emacs.git/blobdiff/608c921f42ead118f8c682868e48b3510fe877de..73d77049d97e72900b95c630e035d2b737a32967:/lisp/vc/diff-mode.el

Recovering the file history back to 1999 to see what the aforementioned change brought
in is going to be more difficult.
